sentences.en: Grave fears are felt for the safety of the missing airman.
sentences.cn: 对失踪飞行员的安全甚为担忧。

sentences.en: Airman Dunk also got a chance to meet the stars.
sentences.cn: 敦克下士也获得了与明星见面的机会。

sentences.en: Among these men was Airman 1st Class Patrick McDonough.
sentences.cn: 在这些人当中有第一类飞行员帕特里克·麦克唐纳。
